      • authenticateByEmail

        public org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authenticateByEmail(java.lang.String userEmail)
        Just returns the Authentication with email and Authorities. Use this method when prerequisites (JWT or something else) are valid and checked! Also this method has to be supported by all the further implementations of custom Authentication providers
